resources.string: Permissions are granted and Health Connect is available. Open Tasker, and look for Tasker Health Connect inside Action -> Plugins
Not all permissions have been granted, open the Health Connect app to grant permissions
Health connect is not installed or is unavailable, check for updates
Health Connect is unavailable or permissions are not granted
Days back to fetch (0 = today only, 1 = from 00:00 yesterday)

Aggregated Health Data will be returned as a JSON array, each object in the array corresponds to 1 day of data. The fields of the object will contain specific data for that day. Fields will not be present if there is no data for that type for that day.
